title: Smokey and the Bandit (1977) (Burt Reynolds, Sally Field)
description:
SMOKEY AND THE BANDIT - 1977

 In the 1970's, with this one movie, Burt Reynolds became the King of Southern Cool.
  
  Burt Reynolds stars as the Bandit in this seminal portrayal of rough-ridin', beer-swillin', sheriff-dodgin', trouble-chasin' truckers. The Bandit's has taken on his craziest haul yet: a trailer full of Coors beer. If he can deliver the goods from Texarkana to Atlanta within forty-eight hours, he'll be $80,000 richer. Hilarious mayhem ensues, however, when the Bandit falls for a runaway bride (Sally Field). As they push toward Atlanta, the two have to evade Fields' vengeful father-in-law, Texas Sheriff Buford T. Justice (Jackie Gleason as the maniac "Smokey" of the title). The stakes get higher and the car chases more frenzied in this hysterical romp through the American highways. Charismatic performances by Reynolds and Gleason made this a huge box office hit.

  Starring: Burt Reynolds, Sally Field, Jackie Gleason, Jerry Reed, Mike Henry, Paul Williams.

  Directed by: Hal Needham.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 32min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 640 x 480
